definition: soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body

sentences.english: Amber charging and notification lights work occasionally but don't count on them.
sentences.chinese: 虎魄充电灯工作和通知，但偶尔也别期看他们。

definition: variant of 羅睺|罗睺[luo2 hou2]
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
Xingtian, headless giant hero of Chinese mythology decapitated by the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
demon in Buddhism/poltergeist in temple that plays tricks on monks and has a taste for their food
